column4: Is there any good program like mIRC for Ubuntu? I tried to compile xchat, but it just won't work, no matter how many packages I download
xchat is installed by default (i think). try just typing xchat from a console
Because there isn't any xchat package for ubuntu on their site :(
Anyway, I want to be able to compile programs anyway.. I thought Ubuntu came with the nessecary tools..
but even after installing make, glibc-dev and build-essential, it won't work
It say it can't find -lperl in some folder
I didn't know xchat was allready supplied, I looked for it in the synaptic thing
it's definately available through synaptic in breezy
